title: 5-Minute Breathing Reset
summary: Guided diaphragmatic breathing to lower stress markers.
body: Find a comfortable seat, inhale for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 6. Repeat for five cycles.

title: Desk-Friendly Mobility Flow
summary: Three light stretches to release tension during work sprints.
body: Neck rolls for 30 seconds, seated spinal twist for each side, and standing quad stretch for 45 seconds per leg.
source_title: Short stretching breaks reduce musculoskeletal discomfort

title: Evening Gratitude Prompt
summary: Reflective journaling to reinforce positive affect before sleep.
body: List three moments that brought calm or joy today, and note one intention for tomorrow.
